We’re Now Seeking

CERTIFIED FLIGHT INSTRUCTORS

Benefits of building your flight experience with AeroGuard:

  • Earn up to $36,000 in salary and bonuses
  • Free MEI for qualified instructors
  • Automatic pay raise in 9 months
  • Up to $2,000 relocation assistance provided
  • 3 weeks of temporary housing available
  • Unique partnership with SkyWest Airlines providing airline mentorship & monthly workshops
  • Two campuses (KDVT and KCHD)
  • Onsite maintenance working 24 hours a day
  • 400+ students provides plenty of flying
  • More than 350 days of flying weather
  • Fly a standardized fleet of Piper Archers and Piper Seminoles

Minimum Qualifications

  • CFI
  • 3rd Class Medical
  • Ability to work in the United States

OTHER OPPORTUNITIES

2-Year CFI

The 2 Year CFI is responsible for creating a safe training environment for our customers and ensuring that the class instructors are following and complying with AeroGuard’s safety regulations.

Open Full Job Description

Send Your Resume

Team Leader

The Team Leader is responsible for creating a safe training environment for our customers and ensuring that our employees follow and comply with Aeroguard’s safety regulations.

Open Full Job Description

Send Your Resume

Check Ride Coordinator

With a meticulous attention to detail, and strategic approach, the Check Ride Coordinator is responsible for the daily coordination and scheduling, of all student pilot and instructor pilot check rides.

Open Full Job Description

Send Your Resume

Driver

Drivers are responsible for the safe and efficient transportation of passengers consistent with the State of Arizona regulations, DOT, FMCSA and AeroGuard Flight Training Center’s policies and procedures.
